channel.title: [PI] handcannon shot wearing problem!
channel.description:
Hi,
I got 2 problems with handcannon shots.
1. When I spawn it doesnt spawn like all arrows in total amount but per item in my invetory. So when I spawn 28 of them it doesnt show 1 handcannon shot with 28 amount on it but it spawns in mine whole invetory.
2. When I wear it, It wears in full helm case. I already added 15243 at itemassistant by arrows but it doesn't give a result.
Please give me any tip ??
